title: The Rise Of The Online Rebuttal â€” And How It's Making Waves In Print
teaser: Actor George Clooney published an online response to allegations made about his upcoming marriage by The Daily Mail, convincing the British tabloid to take its story down. It was just the latest successful example of an evolving phenomenon: the online rebuttal.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
